articles.title: A 'fevered hallucination': Latin America meets Vivek Ramaswamy - POLITICO
articles.description: The Republican candidate wants to prioritize the Western Hemisphere, but in ways that worry its leaders.
articles.content: But in a recent major speech and an essay in The American Conservative, published after his breakout GOP primary debate performance, the 38-year-old laid out a more comprehensive foreign policy with … [+6477 chars]
